penggunaan_teknologi: Technologies and Platforms We Work With

company.deskripsi: Fosan is an IT consulting and software development company that started from a Full Stack Developer Coding Bootcamp. Our focus on current industry developments shows that we can call flexibly and are ready to improve our skills to meet future project needs. Work transparency, timeline control, and consistently high service quality are our professionalism in providing solutions and helping clients achieve their business goals.

layanan.hero: IT Consulting and Software Development Services
layanan.deskripsi_hero: We help your business grow with modern, fast and responsive software.

alasan1.title: Modern Design
alasan1.deskripsi: Using the latest technology for elegant design.

alasan2.title: Security Guaranteed
alasan2.deskripsi: Customer data security is our top priority.

alasan3.title: Support 24/7
alasan3.deskripsi: Our team is ready to help anytime if there are any problems.

desk_job.title: Software consulting
desk_job.text: We combine deep multi-domain expertise, client-centric thinking, and an innovative approach to design and plan reliable solutions that perfectly match the needs and behaviors of their users.

desk_job.title: Custom software development
desk_job.text: We develop software with long-term business value - uniquely tailored to your business processes and tailored to future needs.

desk_job.title: Enterprise software development
desk_job.text: We build multi-faceted enterprise solutions that can easily withstand the highest loads, scale with your business growth, and flexibly accommodate functional expansions.

desk_job.title: Software product development
desk_job.text: We create robust SaaS, mobile, and desktop software products with great UX that drive fast-paced development.

desk_job.title: Cloud development
desk_job.text: We design and deliver scalable, portable, and secure cloud applications while helping migrate applications of any complexity from on-premises infrastructure to the cloud.

desk_job.title: Support and maintenance
desk_job.text: We ensure the smooth operation and relevance of your software through continuous performance monitoring, proactive optimization, rapid issue resolution, and the delivery of new features and integrations.

desk_job.title: Legacy software modernization
desk_job.text: We redesign and upgrade existing software to help you achieve modern solutions with optimal costs and minimal disruption to business workflows.

desk_job.title: Web Portals
desk_job.text: The web portals we create automatically collect data from enterprise systems and serve as an up-to-date information source and assistance platform for users.

desk_job.title: Websites
desk_job.text: We ensure our websites have an easy-to-use page editor for managing dynamic content.

desk_job.title: Web Apps
desk_job.text: We enhance business efficiency using scalable microservices architecture, enabling high automation in all business processes.

desk_job.title: E-commerce
desk_job.text: We implement intelligent automation to streamline workflows and integrate enterprise applications for seamless operations.

simpus.description: It is a SIMPUS developed by the FOSAN team using the latest technology which aims to increase the effectiveness and efficiency of data and information management in health centers.

modul.text: SIMPUS developed by FOSAN accommodates the following Modules:

list.name: EMR (Electronic Medical Record) A module containing all patient medical record data and services provided at the health center.

integrasi.text: FOSAN developed SIMPUS which is integrated with:

list.name: 1.Health Screening - Integration of Primary Services (ILP) In accordance with Decree of the Minister of Health No. 01.07/MENKES/2025/2023 concerning Technical Guidelines for Integration of Primary Health Services.
3.KYC (Know Your Customer) Profile Verification SATU SEHAT Mobile
Real-Time Information Real-time patient data can be updated and viewed directly by doctors and/or other medical personnel, so that treatment decisions are more timely.

Can Be Sent Periodically (Reducing Network Load) Visits, especially homecare conducted by health workers, can have their data sent periodically and collectively according to the available format. Thus increasing the efficiency of sending data to the server.

simrs.description: It is a SIMRS developed by the FOSAN team using the latest technology based on Enterprise Resources Planning (ERP) which aims to manage activities in the hospital easily, effectively, accurately and efficiently.

modul.text: SIMRS developed by FOSAN accommodates the following Modules:

list.name: EMR (Electronic Medical Record)
list.description: A module containing all patient medical record data and services provided while in hospital.

list.name: Modul Front Office
list.description: Modules in SIMRS that accommodate hospital operational management activities including patient management and services, polyclinic and doctor scheduling, and financial administration.

subModules.name: Outpatient Installation Services
subModules.description: Processing outpatient registration, emergency room services, arranging on-call doctors to making prescriptions and registering with other installation services such as laboratory and radiology.

subModules.name: Emergency Installation Services
subModules.description: Processing emergency patient registration, bed management, and other supporting services.

subModules.name: Inpatient Installation Services
subModules.description: Processing inpatient installation services including SOAP input and facilitating real-time bed management to automating the recapitulation of treatment costs.

subModules.name: Laboratory Installation Services
subModules.description: Processing registration and processing laboratory support examination services up to printing results.

subModules.name: Radiology Installation Services
subModules.description: Processing registration and processing supporting radiology examination services until printing the results.

subModules.name: Central Surgical Installation Services
subModules.description: Processing registration and processing operating rooms and their schedules, up to operations management.

subModules.name: Pharmacy Management
subModules.description: Pharmacy inventory consisting of pharmacy master, prescription dispensing transaction management, inventory control, and reporting on stock usage in pharmacy.

subModules.name: Personnel Management
subModules.description: A module developed to manage employee data management in hospitals (medical and non-medical personnel) efficiently.

subModules.name: Warehouse Module
subModules.description: The module is developed to manage stock of medicines and medical equipment, manage procurement of goods, monitor stock usage, evaluate the payment process to suppliers, and automatically provide stock availability reports in real time.

subModules.name: Sales Module
subModules.description: A module developed to manage patient transactions, provide billing information, process payments, and generate financial reports within a certain period.

subModules.name: Billing Module
subModules.description: A module containing billing information and payment status for patient services.

subModules.name: Accounting Module
subModules.description: A module developed to manage hospital financial reports and monitor cash flow effectively.

subModules.name: Asset Management
subModules.description: The module was developed to manage hospital assets, including asset inventory, monitoring maintenance, and optimizing the use of facilities and infrastructure.

list.name: BPJS Health Integration
list.description: This developed module functions to support the management of BPJS patient referrals to facilitate the flow of health services.

list.name: Integrasi INACBG’s
list.description: This module is used to make it easier for hospitals to prepare claims and cost group reports quickly and accurately.

list.name: Integrasi SATU SEHAT Kemenkes
list.description: This module enables real-time data exchange, including patient medical record data and patient information between SIM-RS and the SATU SEHAT Platform.

Simadu.description: It is an academic information system platform for Poltekkes Kemenkes Semarang students that can manage activities related to lectures.

list.name: Content Management
list.description: Features that allow users to have access limitations in using the system. Users can be determined by the campus, so that users who access get different benefits according to their functions.

list.name: Academic Calendar
list.description: This feature allows admins to manage academic calendars and lecture periods that are in accordance with the current semester. In addition, students can directly view the academic calendar and lecture periods that have been updated by the admin.

list.name: Her-Registrasi
list.description: A feature that makes it easier for users to manage registration data, leave registration, data on students who have not registered, leave application data, active lecture status, and payment status of students.

list.name: Lecture Activities
list.description: a feature that makes it easier for users to manage and display course data, course substance, curriculum, curriculum subjects, lecture classes, lecture schedules, UAT schedules, UAS schedules, and KRS packages.

list.name: Value Management
list.description: A feature that makes it easier for users to set value management according to the courses taught by lecturers and the management of the value scale of each study program on campus.

list.name: Student Values
list.description: This feature makes it easier for teachers to compile and obtain student progress reports. This feature will provide monitoring reports such as attendance levels, how often students access learning materials, to a recap of course assessment results, mid-term exams, and final exams that have been carried out by students. In addition to teachers, students can also see the development of their abilities in this feature.

list.name: Final Project Management
list.description: This feature makes it easier for users to monitor the progress of the final project in progress. Final project management includes submitting titles and submitting exams/seminar results.

list.name: Graduation
list.description: A feature that makes it easier for users to monitor graduation activities, including a list of graduation periods and available graduation participants.

list.name: Quality Assurance
list.description: The quality assurance feature makes it easier for users to obtain information related to the university profile and accreditation of each study program owned by the campus.

list.name: Room Management
list.description: This feature makes it easier for users to monitor the rooms/classes used for lectures and to book rooms for the next lecture activity.

live_japan.description: It is a platform developed for digital learning/courses that makes the process of learning English, managing materials, evaluating student progress and paying for classes easier. So that online course activities become more flexible, interactive and efficient.

list.name: Content Management
list.description: A feature that allows teachers and students to have limited access to use the system. Teachers can manage teaching materials in the form of text, video, or audio. While students can use their accounts to get classes and materials in the system.

list.name: Online Registration
list.description: This feature allows students to register online easily and quickly. In addition, students can book course classes according to the schedule and teachers available in the system.

list.name: Online Class
list.description: This feature is used to conduct online learning. Students can learn through materials in the form of text, video, or audio that have been prepared by the teacher.

list.name: Discussion Forum
list.description: This feature allows students and teachers to discuss the material given through the forum. This feature can be made in private or public (large class) form.

list.name: Video Conference
list.description: This feature allows teachers and students to interact directly via video calls without having to meet face to face.

list.name: Evaluations
list.description: The evaluations feature contains online quizzes and exams. Online quizzes and exams in the system make it easier for students to take online quizzes or exams that have been prepared by the teacher as part of the evaluation of course activities.

list.name: Lesson Hystory
list.description: This feature makes it easier for teachers to compile and obtain student progress reports. This feature will provide monitoring reports such as student attendance levels, how often students access learning materials, to recaps of student quizzes and exams. In addition to teachers, students can also see the development of their abilities in this feature.

list.name: Order and Payment System
list.description: This feature makes it easy for students to see available classes and schedules, make class bookings, and class payments that can be made with several types of digital payments. So that from the beginning of registration, payment, and learning activities can be done in this one system.

wms.portfolio: Warehouse Management System Bahtera Adi Jaya

STARA.description: It is a Human Resources Information System platform that can manage and automate various aspects of human resources in a company, starting from employee data management, recruitment, performance management, salary management, reporting, and others. This system is not just a technological tool, but a strategy that provides many benefits to the company.

list.name: Content Management
list.description: A feature that allows users to have limited access to use the system based on their role in the company.

list.name: Management Karyawan
list.description: This feature makes it easier for users to manage overall employee data such as complete employee identity, work agreements, work orders, and transfer data.

list.name: Job vacancy
list.description: This feature makes it easy for users to manage the list of job vacancies to be done by the company. This feature also allows users to monitor and evaluate recruitment activities from the distribution of job vacancies to the results of the applicant selection stage.

list.name: Work Accident Report
list.description: This feature makes it easier for users to manage work accident data that occurs to employees while carrying out their work.

list.name: Employee Report
list.description: This feature allows users to manage employee-related reports including salary projections, salary recaps, salary deductions, THR, and overtime accumulation.

list.name: Employee Assessment
list.description: This feature makes it easier for users to evaluate the performance of each employee. So that the data can be used to improve the quality of human resources in the company.

list.name: Administrative Efficiency
list.description: This system can automate administrative tasks such as payroll processing, leave management, and employee reporting. In addition, STARA reduces the risk of human error such as incorrect payroll calculations and inaccurate leave tracking. Thus creating a more efficient, productive, and organized environment in human resource management.

list.name: Data Accuracy
list.description: This platform is a technology that can store more structured and accurate employee data. So that information about work history, and performance evaluations can be accessed easily and up to date.

list.name: Increased Employee Satisfaction
list.description: STARA enables companies to better plan, track, and measure employee quality improvements. So that employees feel more empowered and have a significant impact on the performance produced to increase company productivity.

list.name: Legal Compliance
list.description: STARA helps companies comply with employment laws and regulations by automating administrative processes that follow legal standards.
